communityDescription: GDG is an independent group; our activities and the opinions expressed here should in no way be linked to Google, the corporation.

venue.address:
talabat HQ
25A Al Safa Street
Dubai, 0000

description.short: An annual event hosted by the Google Developers Group across the world to bring the technology closer to the developers. It is an all day developer conference where we aim to focus on multiple technologies through lightning talks, sessions, workshops, etc.
description.long: DevFest is a global community-driven tech conference, hosted by the Google Developer Groups (GDG) community. Each DevFest event is crafted by its GDG organizers to fit the learning needs and interests of their local developer community, with a strong focus on knowledge exchange, networking, and learning about Google developer technologies.

whatToExpect.title: Technical Sessions
whatToExpect.description: Learn about the latest developer technologies from Google in the form of technical sessions and hands-on workshops.

whatToExpect.title: Workshops and Codelabs
whatToExpect.description: Participate in hands-on workshops and codelabs run by experienced developers.

whatToExpect.title: Networking
whatToExpect.description: Connect with fellow developers and Googlers to share ideas and learn new things.

whatToExpect.title: Panel Discussions
whatToExpect.description: Join panel discussions to learn about the latest trends in technology and get insights from industry experts.

whatToExpect.title: Swags and Goodies
whatToExpect.description: Get swags and goodies from Google and GDG Cloud Emirates.

whatToExpect.title: Fun Activities
whatToExpect.description: Participate in fun activities and games to win exciting prizes.

pastDevFest.summery: GDG Cloud Emirates recently hosted an exciting Google I/O Extended event, bringing together developers, tech enthusiasts, and Google fans for a day filled with insightful sessions, hands-on workshops, and inspiring discussions. The event served as a platform to explore the latest advancements in Google technologies, including Cloud, Android, AI, and web development.
